00127 int
00128 Cudd_PrintLinear(
00129   DdManager * table)
00130 {
00131     int i,j,k;
00132     int retval;
00133     int nvars = table->linearSize;
00134     int wordsPerRow = ((nvars - 1) >> LOGBPL) + 1;
00135     long word;
00136 
00137     for (i = 0; i < nvars; i++) {
00138         for (j = 0; j < wordsPerRow; j++) {
00139             word = table->linear[i*wordsPerRow + j];
00140             for (k = 0; k < BPL; k++) {
00141                 retval = fprintf(stdout,"%ld",word & 1);
00142                 if (retval == 0) return(0);
00143                 word >>= 1;
00144             }
00145         }
00146         retval = fprintf(stdout,"\n");
00147         if (retval == 0) return(0);
00148     }
00149     return(1);
00150 
00151 } /* end of Cudd_PrintLinear */
00152 
00153 
00165 int
00166 Cudd_ReadLinear(
00167   DdManager * table /* CUDD manager */,
00168   int  x /* row index */,
00169   int  y /* column index */)
00170 {
00171     int nvars = table->size;
00172     int wordsPerRow = ((nvars - 1) >> LOGBPL) + 1;
00173     long word;
00174     int bit;
00175     int result;
00176 
00177     assert(table->size == table->linearSize);
00178 
00179     word = wordsPerRow * x + (y >> LOGBPL);
00180     bit  = y & (BPL-1);
00181     result = (int) ((table->linear[word] >> bit) & 1);
00182     return(result);
00183 
00184 } /* end of Cudd_ReadLinear */

00191 
00214 int
00215 cuddLinearAndSifting(
00216   DdManager * table,
00217   int  lower,
00218   int  upper)
00219 {
00220     int         i;
00221     int         *var = NULL;
00222     int         size;
00223     int         x;
00224     int         result;
00225 #ifdef DD_STATS
00226     int         previousSize;
00227 #endif
00228 
00229 #ifdef DD_STATS
00230     ddTotalNumberLinearTr = 0;
00231 #endif
00232 
00233     size = table->size;
00234 
00235     if (table->linear == NULL) {
00236         result = cuddInitLinear(table);
00237         if (result == 0) goto cuddLinearAndSiftingOutOfMem; 
00238 #if 0
00239         (void) fprintf(stdout,"\n");
00240         result = Cudd_PrintLinear(table);
00241         if (result == 0) goto cuddLinearAndSiftingOutOfMem; 
00242 #endif
00243     } else if (table->size != table->linearSize) {
00244         result = cuddResizeLinear(table);
00245         if (result == 0) goto cuddLinearAndSiftingOutOfMem; 
00246 #if 0
00247         (void) fprintf(stdout,"\n");
00248         result = Cudd_PrintLinear(table);
00249         if (result == 0) goto cuddLinearAndSiftingOutOfMem; 
00250 #endif
00251     }
00252 
00253     /* Find order in which to sift variables. */
00254     var = NULL;
00255     entry = ALLOC(int,size);
00256     if (entry == NULL) {
00257         table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00258         goto cuddLinearAndSiftingOutOfMem;
00259     }
00260     var = ALLOC(int,size);
00261     if (var == NULL) {
00262         table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00263         goto cuddLinearAndSiftingOutOfMem;
00264     }
00265 
00266     for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00267         x = table->perm[i];
00268         entry[i] = table->subtables[x].keys;
00269         var[i] = i;
00270     }
00271 
00272     qsort((void *)var,size,sizeof(int),(int (*)(const void *, const void *))ddLinearUniqueCompare);
00273 
00274     /* Now sift. */
00275     for (i = 0; i < ddMin(table->siftMaxVar,size); i++) {
00276         x = table->perm[var[i]];
00277         if (x < lower || x > upper) continue;
00278 #ifdef DD_STATS
00279         previousSize = table->keys - table->isolated;
00280 #endif
00281         result = ddLinearAndSiftingAux(table,x,lower,upper);
00282         if (!result) goto cuddLinearAndSiftingOutOfMem; 
00283 #ifdef DD_STATS
00284         if (table->keys < (unsigned) previousSize + table->isolated) {
00285             (void) fprintf(stdout,"-");
00286         } else if (table->keys > (unsigned) previousSize + table->isolated) {
00287             (void) fprintf(stdout,"+"); /* should never happen */
00288             (void) fprintf(stdout,"\nSize increased from %d to %d while sifting variable %d\n", previousSize, table->keys - table->isolated, var[i]);
00289         } else {
00290             (void) fprintf(stdout,"=");
00291         }
00292         fflush(stdout);
00293 #endif
00294 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00295         (void) Cudd_DebugCheck(table);
00296 #endif
00297     }
00298 
00299     FREE(var);
00300     FREE(entry);
00301 
00302 #ifdef DD_STATS
00303     (void) fprintf(stdout,"\n#:L_LINSIFT %8d: linear trans.",
00304                    ddTotalNumberLinearTr);
00305 #endif
00306 
00307     return(1);
00308 
00309 cuddLinearAndSiftingOutOfMem:
00310 
00311     if (entry != NULL) FREE(entry);
00312     if (var != NULL) FREE(var);
00313 
00314     return(0); 
00315 
00316 } /* end of cuddLinearAndSifting */

00336 static int
00337 ddLinearUniqueCompare(
00338   int * ptrX,
00339   int * ptrY)
00340 {
00341 #if 0
00342     if (entry[*ptrY] == entry[*ptrX]) {
00343         return((*ptrX) - (*ptrY));
00344     }
00345 #endif
00346     return(entry[*ptrY] - entry[*ptrX]);
00347 
00348 } /* end of ddLinearUniqueCompare */

00350 
00364 static int
00365 ddLinearAndSiftingAux(
00366   DdManager * table,
00367   int  x,
00368   int  xLow,
00369   int  xHigh)
00370 {
00371 
00372     Move        *move;
00373     Move        *moveUp;                /* list of up moves */
00374     Move        *moveDown;              /* list of down moves */
00375     int         initialSize;
00376     int         result;
00377 
00378     initialSize = table->keys - table->isolated;
00379 
00380     moveDown = NULL;
00381     moveUp = NULL;
00382 
00383     if (x == xLow) {
00384         moveDown = ddLinearAndSiftingDown(table,x,xHigh,NULL);
00385         /* At this point x --> xHigh unless bounding occurred. */
00386         if (moveDown == (Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) goto ddLinearAndSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00387         /* Move backward and stop at best position. */  
00388         result = ddLinearAndSiftingBackward(table,initialSize,moveDown);
00389         if (!result) goto ddLinearAndSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00390 
00391     } else if (x == xHigh) {
00392         moveUp = ddLinearAndSiftingUp(table,x,xLow,NULL);
00393         /* At this point x --> xLow unless bounding occurred. */
00394         if (moveUp == (Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) goto ddLinearAndSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00395         /* Move backward and stop at best position. */
00396         result = ddLinearAndSiftingBackward(table,initialSize,moveUp);
00397         if (!result) goto ddLinearAndSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00398 
00399     } else if ((x - xLow) > (xHigh - x)) { /* must go down first: shorter */
00400         moveDown = ddLinearAndSiftingDown(table,x,xHigh,NULL);
00401         /* At this point x --> xHigh unless bounding occurred. */
00402         if (moveDown == (Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) goto ddLinearAndSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00403         moveUp = ddUndoMoves(table,moveDown);
00404 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00405         assert(moveUp == NULL || moveUp->x == x);
00406 #endif
00407         moveUp = ddLinearAndSiftingUp(table,x,xLow,moveUp);
00408         if (moveUp == (Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) goto ddLinearAndSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00409         /* Move backward and stop at best position. */  
00410         result = ddLinearAndSiftingBackward(table,initialSize,moveUp);
00411         if (!result) goto ddLinearAndSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00412 
00413     } else { /* must go up first: shorter */
00414         moveUp = ddLinearAndSiftingUp(table,x,xLow,NULL);
00415         /* At this point x --> xLow unless bounding occurred. */
00416         if (moveUp == (Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) goto ddLinearAndSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00417         moveDown = ddUndoMoves(table,moveUp);
00418 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00419         assert(moveDown == NULL || moveDown->y == x);
00420 #endif
00421         moveDown = ddLinearAndSiftingDown(table,x,xHigh,moveDown);
00422         if (moveDown == (Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) goto ddLinearAndSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00423         /* Move backward and stop at best position. */  
00424         result = ddLinearAndSiftingBackward(table,initialSize,moveDown);
00425         if (!result) goto ddLinearAndSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00426     }
00427 
00428     while (moveDown != NULL) {
00429         move = moveDown->next;
00430         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moveDown);
00431         moveDown = move;
00432     }
00433     while (moveUp != NULL) {
00434         move = moveUp->next;
00435         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moveUp);
00436         moveUp = move;
00437     }
00438 
00439     return(1);
00440 
00441 ddLinearAndSiftingAuxOutOfMem:
00442     while (moveDown != NULL) {
00443         move = moveDown->next;
00444         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moveDown);
00445         moveDown = move;
00446     }
00447     while (moveUp != NULL) {
00448         move = moveUp->next;
00449         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moveUp);
00450         moveUp = move;
00451     }
00452 
00453     return(0);
00454 
00455 } /* end of ddLinearAndSiftingAux */

00457 
00470 static Move *
00471 ddLinearAndSiftingUp(
00472   DdManager * table,
00473   int  y,
00474   int  xLow,
00475   Move * prevMoves)
00476 {
00477     Move        *moves;
00478     Move        *move;
00479     int         x;
00480     int         size, newsize;
00481     int         limitSize;
00482     int         xindex, yindex;
00483     int         isolated;
00484     int         L;      /* lower bound on DD size */
00485 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00486     int checkL;
00487     int z;
00488     int zindex;
00489 #endif
00490 
00491     moves = prevMoves;
00492     yindex = table->invperm[y];
00493 
00494     /* Initialize the lower bound.
00495     ** The part of the DD below y will not change.
00496     ** The part of the DD above y that does not interact with y will not
00497     ** change. The rest may vanish in the best case, except for
00498     ** the nodes at level xLow, which will not vanish, regardless.
00499     */
00500     limitSize = L = table->keys - table->isolated;
00501     for (x = xLow + 1; x < y; x++) {
00502         xindex = table->invperm[x];
00503         if (cuddTestInteract(table,xindex,yindex)) {
00504             isolated = table->vars[xindex]->ref == 1;
00505             L -= table->subtables[x].keys - isolated;
00506         }
00507     }
00508     isolated = table->vars[yindex]->ref == 1;
00509     L -= table->subtables[y].keys - isolated;
00510 
00511     x = cuddNextLow(table,y);
00512     while (x >= xLow && L <= limitSize) {
00513         xindex = table->invperm[x];
00514 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00515         checkL = table->keys - table->isolated;
00516         for (z = xLow + 1; z < y; z++) {
00517             zindex = table->invperm[z];
00518             if (cuddTestInteract(table,zindex,yindex)) {
00519                 isolated = table->vars[zindex]->ref == 1;
00520                 checkL -= table->subtables[z].keys - isolated;
00521             }
00522         }
00523         isolated = table->vars[yindex]->ref == 1;
00524         checkL -= table->subtables[y].keys - isolated;
00525         if (L != checkL) {
00526             (void) fprintf(stdout, "checkL(%d) != L(%d)\n",checkL,L);
00527         }
00528 #endif
00529         size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,x,y);
00530         if (size == 0) goto ddLinearAndSiftingUpOutOfMem;
00531         newsize = cuddLinearInPlace(table,x,y);
00532         if (newsize == 0) goto ddLinearAndSiftingUpOutOfMem;
00533         move = (Move *) cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00534         if (move == NULL) goto ddLinearAndSiftingUpOutOfMem;
00535         move->x = x;
00536         move->y = y;
00537         move->next = moves;
00538         moves = move;
00539         move->flags = CUDD_SWAP_MOVE;
00540         if (newsize >= size) {
00541             /* Undo transformation. The transformation we apply is
00542             ** its own inverse. Hence, we just apply the transformation
00543             ** again.
00544             */
00545             newsize = cuddLinearInPlace(table,x,y);
00546             if (newsize == 0) goto ddLinearAndSiftingUpOutOfMem;
00547 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00548             if (newsize != size) {
00549                 (void) fprintf(stdout,"Change in size after identity transformation! From %d to %d\n",size,newsize);
00550             }
00551 #endif
00552         } else if (cuddTestInteract(table,xindex,yindex)) {
00553             size = newsize;
00554             move->flags = CUDD_LINEAR_TRANSFORM_MOVE;
00555             ddUpdateInteractionMatrix(table,xindex,yindex);
00556         }
00557         move->size = size;
00558         /* Update the lower bound. */
00559         if (cuddTestInteract(table,xindex,yindex)) {
00560             isolated = table->vars[xindex]->ref == 1;
00561             L += table->subtables[y].keys - isolated;
00562         }
00563         if ((double) size > (double) limitSize * table->maxGrowth) break;
00564         if (size < limitSize) limitSize = size;
00565         y = x;
00566         x = cuddNextLow(table,y);
00567     }
00568     return(moves);
00569 
00570 ddLinearAndSiftingUpOutOfMem:
00571     while (moves != NULL) {
00572         move = moves->next;
00573         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moves);
00574         moves = move;
00575     }
00576     return((Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00577 
00578 } /* end of ddLinearAndSiftingUp */
00579     
00580 
00593 static Move *
00594 ddLinearAndSiftingDown(
00595   DdManager * table,
00596   int  x,
00597   int  xHigh,
00598   Move * prevMoves)
00599 {
00600     Move        *moves;
00601     Move        *move;
00602     int         y;
00603     int         size, newsize;
00604     int         R;      /* upper bound on node decrease */
00605     int         limitSize;
00606     int         xindex, yindex;
00607     int         isolated;
00608 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00609     int         checkR;
00610     int         z;
00611     int         zindex;
00612 #endif
00613 
00614     moves = prevMoves;
00615     /* Initialize R */
00616     xindex = table->invperm[x];
00617     limitSize = size = table->keys - table->isolated;
00618     R = 0;
00619     for (y = xHigh; y > x; y--) {
00620         yindex = table->invperm[y];
00621         if (cuddTestInteract(table,xindex,yindex)) {
00622             isolated = table->vars[yindex]->ref == 1;
00623             R += table->subtables[y].keys - isolated;
00624         }
00625     }
00626 
00627     y = cuddNextHigh(table,x);
00628     while (y <= xHigh && size - R < limitSize) {
00629 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00630         checkR = 0;
00631         for (z = xHigh; z > x; z--) {
00632             zindex = table->invperm[z];
00633             if (cuddTestInteract(table,xindex,zindex)) {
00634                 isolated = table->vars[zindex]->ref == 1;
00635                 checkR += table->subtables[z].keys - isolated;
00636             }
00637         }
00638         if (R != checkR) {
00639             (void) fprintf(stdout, "checkR(%d) != R(%d)\n",checkR,R);
00640         }
00641 #endif
00642         /* Update upper bound on node decrease. */
00643         yindex = table->invperm[y];
00644         if (cuddTestInteract(table,xindex,yindex)) {
00645             isolated = table->vars[yindex]->ref == 1;
00646             R -= table->subtables[y].keys - isolated;
00647         }
00648         size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,x,y);
00649         if (size == 0) goto ddLinearAndSiftingDownOutOfMem; 
00650         newsize = cuddLinearInPlace(table,x,y);
00651         if (newsize == 0) goto ddLinearAndSiftingDownOutOfMem;
00652         move = (Move *) cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00653         if (move == NULL) goto ddLinearAndSiftingDownOutOfMem;
00654         move->x = x;
00655         move->y = y;
00656         move->next = moves;
00657         moves = move;
00658         move->flags = CUDD_SWAP_MOVE;
00659         if (newsize >= size) {
00660             /* Undo transformation. The transformation we apply is
00661             ** its own inverse. Hence, we just apply the transformation
00662             ** again.
00663             */
00664             newsize = cuddLinearInPlace(table,x,y);
00665             if (newsize == 0) goto ddLinearAndSiftingDownOutOfMem;
00666             if (newsize != size) {
00667                 (void) fprintf(stdout,"Change in size after identity transformation! From %d to %d\n",size,newsize);
00668             }
00669         } else if (cuddTestInteract(table,xindex,yindex)) {
00670             size = newsize;
00671             move->flags = CUDD_LINEAR_TRANSFORM_MOVE;
00672             ddUpdateInteractionMatrix(table,xindex,yindex);
00673         }
00674         move->size = size;
00675         if ((double) size > (double) limitSize * table->maxGrowth) break;
00676         if (size < limitSize) limitSize = size;
00677         x = y;
00678         y = cuddNextHigh(table,x);
00679     }
00680     return(moves);
00681 
00682 ddLinearAndSiftingDownOutOfMem:
00683     while (moves != NULL) {
00684         move = moves->next;
00685         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moves);
00686         moves = move;
00687     }
00688     return((Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00689 
00690 } /* end of ddLinearAndSiftingDown */
00691 
00692 
00706 static int
00707 ddLinearAndSiftingBackward(
00708   DdManager * table,
00709   int  size,
00710   Move * moves)
00711 {
00712     Move *move;
00713     int res;
00714 
00715     for (move = moves; move != NULL; move = move->next) {
00716         if (move->size < size) {
00717             size = move->size;
00718         }
00719     }
00720 
00721     for (move = moves; move != NULL; move = move->next) {
00722         if (move->size == size) return(1);
00723         if (move->flags == CUDD_LINEAR_TRANSFORM_MOVE) {
00724             res = cuddLinearInPlace(table,(int)move->x,(int)move->y);
00725             if (!res) return(0);
00726         }
00727         res = cuddSwapInPlace(table,(int)move->x,(int)move->y);
00728         if (!res) return(0);
00729         if (move->flags == CUDD_INVERSE_TRANSFORM_MOVE) {
00730             res = cuddLinearInPlace(table,(int)move->x,(int)move->y);
00731             if (!res) return(0);
00732         }
00733     }
00734 
00735     return(1);
00736 
00737 } /* end of ddLinearAndSiftingBackward */
00738 
00739 
00752 static Move*
00753 ddUndoMoves(
00754   DdManager * table,
00755   Move * moves)
00756 {
00757     Move *invmoves = NULL;
00758     Move *move;
00759     Move *invmove;
00760     int size;
00761 
00762     for (move = moves; move != NULL; move = move->next) {
00763         invmove = (Move *) cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00764         if (invmove == NULL) goto ddUndoMovesOutOfMem;
00765         invmove->x = move->x;
00766         invmove->y = move->y;
00767         invmove->next = invmoves;
00768         invmoves = invmove;
00769         if (move->flags == CUDD_SWAP_MOVE) {
00770             invmove->flags = CUDD_SWAP_MOVE;
00771             size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,(int)move->x,(int)move->y);
00772             if (!size) goto ddUndoMovesOutOfMem;
00773         } else if (move->flags == CUDD_LINEAR_TRANSFORM_MOVE) {
00774             invmove->flags = CUDD_INVERSE_TRANSFORM_MOVE;
00775             size = cuddLinearInPlace(table,(int)move->x,(int)move->y);
00776             if (!size) goto ddUndoMovesOutOfMem;
00777             size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,(int)move->x,(int)move->y);
00778             if (!size) goto ddUndoMovesOutOfMem;
00779         } else { /* must be CUDD_INVERSE_TRANSFORM_MOVE */
00780 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00781             (void) fprintf(stdout,"Unforseen event in ddUndoMoves!\n");
00782 #endif
00783             invmove->flags = CUDD_LINEAR_TRANSFORM_MOVE;
00784             size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,(int)move->x,(int)move->y);
00785             if (!size) goto ddUndoMovesOutOfMem;
00786             size = cuddLinearInPlace(table,(int)move->x,(int)move->y);
00787             if (!size) goto ddUndoMovesOutOfMem;
00788         }
00789         invmove->size = size;
00790     }
00791 
00792     return(invmoves);
00793 
00794 ddUndoMovesOutOfMem:
00795     while (invmoves != NULL) {
00796         move = invmoves->next;
00797         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) invmoves);
00798         invmoves = move;
00799     }
00800     return((Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00801 
00802 } /* end of ddUndoMoves */
00803 
00804 
00823 static int
00824 cuddLinearInPlace(
00825   DdManager * table,
00826   int  x,
00827   int  y)
00828 {
00829 #ifdef __osf__
00830 #pragma pointer_size save
00831 #pragma pointer_size short
00832 #endif
00833     DdNode **xlist, **ylist;
00834 #ifdef __osf__
00835 #pragma pointer_size restore
00836 #endif
00837     int    xindex, yindex;
00838     int    xslots, yslots;
00839     int    xshift, yshift;
00840     int    oldxkeys, oldykeys;
00841     int    newxkeys, newykeys;
00842     int    comple, newcomplement;
00843     int    i;
00844     int    posn;
00845     int    isolated;
00846     DdNode *f,*f0,*f1,*f01,*f00,*f11,*f10,*newf1,*newf0;
00847     DdNode *g,*next,*last = NULL,*previous;
00848     DdNode *tmp;
00849 #if DD_DEBUG
00850     int    count, idcheck;
00851 #endif
00852 
00853 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00854     assert(x < y);
00855     assert(cuddNextHigh(table,x) == y);
00856     assert(table->subtables[x].keys != 0);
00857     assert(table->subtables[y].keys != 0);
00858     assert(table->subtables[x].dead == 0);
00859     assert(table->subtables[y].dead == 0);
00860 #endif
00861 
00862     xindex = table->invperm[x];
00863     yindex = table->invperm[y];
00864 
00865     if (cuddTestInteract(table,xindex,yindex)) {
00866 #ifdef DD_STATS
00867         ddTotalNumberLinearTr++;
00868 #endif
00869         /* Get parameters of x subtable. */
00870         xlist = table->subtables[x].nodelist; 
00871         oldxkeys = table->subtables[x].keys;
00872         xslots = table->subtables[x].slots;
00873         xshift = table->subtables[x].shift;
00874 
00875         /* Get parameters of y subtable. */
00876         ylist = table->subtables[y].nodelist;
00877         oldykeys = table->subtables[y].keys;
00878         yslots = table->subtables[y].slots;
00879         yshift = table->subtables[y].shift;
00880 
00881         newxkeys = 0;
00882         newykeys = oldykeys;
00883 
00884         /* Check whether the two projection functions involved in this
00885         ** swap are isolated. At the end, we'll be able to tell how many
00886         ** isolated projection functions are there by checking only these
00887         ** two functions again. This is done to eliminate the isolated
00888         ** projection functions from the node count.
00889         */
00890         isolated = - ((table->vars[xindex]->ref == 1) +
00891                      (table->vars[yindex]->ref == 1));
00892 
00893         /* The nodes in the x layer are put in a chain.
00894         ** The chain is handled as a FIFO; g points to the beginning and
00895         ** last points to the end.
00896         */
00897         g = NULL;
00898         for (i = 0; i < xslots; i++) {
00899             f = xlist[i];
00900             if (f == NULL) continue;
00901             xlist[i] = NULL;
00902             if (g == NULL) {
00903                 g = f;
00904             } else {
00905                 last->next = f;
00906             }
00907             while ((next = f->next) != NULL) {
00908                 f = next;
00909             } /* while there are elements in the collision chain */
00910             last = f;
00911         } /* for each slot of the x subtable */
00912 
00913         /* Take care of the x nodes that must be re-expressed.
00914         ** They form a linked list pointed by g.
00915         */
00916         f = g;
00917         while (f != NULL) {
00918             next = f->next;
00919             /* Find f1, f0, f11, f10, f01, f00. */
00920             f1 = cuddT(f);
00921 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00922             assert(!(Cudd_IsComplement(f1)));
00923 #endif
00924             if ((int) f1->index == yindex) {
00925                 f11 = cuddT(f1); f10 = cuddE(f1);
00926             } else {
00927                 f11 = f10 = f1;
00928             }
00929 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00930             assert(!(Cudd_IsComplement(f11)));
00931 #endif
00932             f0 = cuddE(f);
00933             comple = Cudd_IsComplement(f0);
00934             f0 = Cudd_Regular(f0);
00935             if ((int) f0->index == yindex) {
00936                 f01 = cuddT(f0); f00 = cuddE(f0);
00937             } else {
00938                 f01 = f00 = f0;
00939             }
00940             if (comple) {
00941                 f01 = Cudd_Not(f01);
00942                 f00 = Cudd_Not(f00);
00943             }
00944             /* Decrease ref count of f1. */
00945             cuddSatDec(f1->ref);
00946             /* Create the new T child. */
00947             if (f11 == f00) {
00948                 newf1 = f11;
00949                 cuddSatInc(newf1->ref);
00950             } else {
00951                 /* Check ylist for triple (yindex,f11,f00). */
00952                 posn = ddHash(f11, f00, yshift);
00953                 /* For each element newf1 in collision list ylist[posn]. */
00954                 newf1 = ylist[posn];
00955                 /* Search the collision chain. */
00956                 while (newf1 != NULL){
00957                     if (cuddT(newf1) == f11 && cuddE(newf1) == f00) {
00958                         cuddSatInc(newf1->ref);
00959                         break; /* match */
00960                     }
00961                     newf1 = newf1->next;
00962                 } /* while newf1 */ 
00963                 if (newf1 == NULL) { /* no match */
00964                     newf1 = cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00965                     if (newf1 == NULL)
00966                         goto cuddLinearOutOfMem;
00967                     newf1->index = yindex; newf1->ref = 1;
00968                     cuddT(newf1) = f11;
00969                     cuddE(newf1) = f00;
00970                     /* Insert newf1 in the collision list ylist[posn];
00971                     ** increase the ref counts of f11 and f00.
00972                     */
00973                     newykeys++;
00974                     newf1->next = ylist[posn];
00975                     ylist[posn] = newf1;
00976                     cuddSatInc(f11->ref);
00977                     tmp = Cudd_Regular(f00);
00978                     cuddSatInc(tmp->ref);
00979                 }
00980             }
00981             cuddT(f) = newf1;
00982 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00983             assert(!(Cudd_IsComplement(newf1)));
00984 #endif
00985 
00986             /* Do the same for f0, keeping complement dots into account. */
00987             /* decrease ref count of f0 */
00988             tmp = Cudd_Regular(f0);
00989             cuddSatDec(tmp->ref);
00990             /* create the new E child */
00991             if (f01 == f10) {
00992                 newf0 = f01;
00993                 tmp = Cudd_Regular(newf0);
00994                 cuddSatInc(tmp->ref); 
00995             } else {
00996                 /* make sure f01 is regular */
00997                 newcomplement = Cudd_IsComplement(f01);
00998                 if (newcomplement) {
00999                     f01 = Cudd_Not(f01);
01000                     f10 = Cudd_Not(f10);
01001                 }
01002                 /* Check ylist for triple (yindex,f01,f10). */
01003                 posn = ddHash(f01, f10, yshift);
01004                 /* For each element newf0 in collision list ylist[posn]. */
01005                 newf0 = ylist[posn];
01006                 /* Search the collision chain. */
01007                 while (newf0 != NULL) {
01008                     if (cuddT(newf0) == f01 && cuddE(newf0) == f10) {
01009                         cuddSatInc(newf0->ref); 
01010                         break; /* match */
01011                     }
01012                     newf0 = newf0->next;
01013                 } /* while newf0 */
01014                 if (newf0 == NULL) { /* no match */
01015                     newf0 = cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
01016                     if (newf0 == NULL)
01017                         goto cuddLinearOutOfMem;
01018                     newf0->index = yindex; newf0->ref = 1;
01019                     cuddT(newf0) = f01;
01020                     cuddE(newf0) = f10;
01021                     /* Insert newf0 in the collision list ylist[posn];
01022                     ** increase the ref counts of f01 and f10.
01023                     */
01024                     newykeys++;
01025                     newf0->next = ylist[posn];
01026                     ylist[posn] = newf0;
01027                     cuddSatInc(f01->ref);
01028                     tmp = Cudd_Regular(f10);
01029                     cuddSatInc(tmp->ref);
01030                 }
01031                 if (newcomplement) {
01032                     newf0 = Cudd_Not(newf0);
01033                 }
01034             }
01035             cuddE(f) = newf0;
01036 
01037             /* Re-insert the modified f in xlist.
01038             ** The modified f does not already exists in xlist.
01039             ** (Because of the uniqueness of the cofactors.)
01040             */
01041             posn = ddHash(newf1, newf0, xshift);
01042             newxkeys++;
01043             f->next = xlist[posn];
01044             xlist[posn] = f;
01045             f = next;
01046         } /* while f != NULL */
01047 
01048         /* GC the y layer. */
01049 
01050         /* For each node f in ylist. */
01051         for (i = 0; i < yslots; i++) {
01052             previous = NULL;
01053             f = ylist[i];
01054             while (f != NULL) {
01055                 next = f->next;
01056                 if (f->ref == 0) {
01057                     tmp = cuddT(f);
01058                     cuddSatDec(tmp->ref);
01059                     tmp = Cudd_Regular(cuddE(f));
01060                     cuddSatDec(tmp->ref);
01061                     cuddDeallocNode(table,f);
01062                     newykeys--;
01063                     if (previous == NULL) {
01064                         ylist[i] = next;
01065                     } else {
01066                         previous->next = next;
01067                     }
01068                 } else {
01069                     previous = f;
01070                 }
01071                 f = next;
01072             } /* while there are elements in the collision list */
01073         } /* for every collision list */
01074 
01075 #if DD_DEBUG
01076 #if 0
01077         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Linearly combining %d and %d\n",x,y);
01078 #endif
01079         count = 0;
01080         idcheck = 0;
01081         for (i = 0; i < yslots; i++) {
01082             f = ylist[i];
01083             while (f != NULL) {
01084                 count++;
01085                 if (f->index != (DdHalfWord) yindex)
01086                     idcheck++;
01087                 f = f->next;
01088             }
01089         }
01090         if (count != newykeys) {
01091             fprintf(stdout,"Error in finding newykeys\toldykeys = %d\tnewykeys = %d\tactual = %d\n",oldykeys,newykeys,count);
01092         }
01093         if (idcheck != 0)
01094             fprintf(stdout,"Error in id's of ylist\twrong id's = %d\n",idcheck);
01095         count = 0;
01096         idcheck = 0;
01097         for (i = 0; i < xslots; i++) {
01098             f = xlist[i];
01099             while (f != NULL) {
01100                 count++;
01101                 if (f->index != (DdHalfWord) xindex)
01102                     idcheck++;
01103                 f = f->next;
01104             }
01105         }
01106         if (count != newxkeys || newxkeys != oldxkeys) {
01107             fprintf(stdout,"Error in finding newxkeys\toldxkeys = %d \tnewxkeys = %d \tactual = %d\n",oldxkeys,newxkeys,count);
01108         }
01109         if (idcheck != 0)
01110             fprintf(stdout,"Error in id's of xlist\twrong id's = %d\n",idcheck);
01111 #endif
01112 
01113         isolated += (table->vars[xindex]->ref == 1) +
01114                     (table->vars[yindex]->ref == 1);
01115         table->isolated += isolated;
01116 
01117         /* Set the appropriate fields in table. */
01118         table->subtables[y].keys = newykeys;
01119 
01120         /* Here we should update the linear combination table
01121         ** to record that x <- x EXNOR y. This is done by complementing
01122         ** the (x,y) entry of the table.
01123         */
01124 
01125         table->keys += newykeys - oldykeys;
01126 
01127         cuddXorLinear(table,xindex,yindex);
01128     }
01129 
01130 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01131     if (zero) {
01132         (void) Cudd_DebugCheck(table);
01133     }
01134 #endif
01135 
01136     return(table->keys - table->isolated);
01137 
01138 cuddLinearOutOfMem:
01139     (void) fprintf(stderr,"Error: cuddLinearInPlace() out of memory\n");
01140 
01141     return (0);
01142 
01143 } /* end of cuddLinearInPlace */
01144 
01145 
01157 static void
01158 ddUpdateInteractionMatrix(
01159   DdManager * table,
01160   int  xindex,
01161   int  yindex)
01162 {
01163     int i;
01164     for (i = 0; i < yindex; i++) {
01165         if (i != xindex && cuddTestInteract(table,i,yindex)) {
01166             if (i < xindex) {
01167                 cuddSetInteract(table,i,xindex);
01168             } else {
01169                 cuddSetInteract(table,xindex,i);
01170             }
01171         }
01172     }
01173     for (i = yindex+1; i < table->size; i++) {
01174         if (i != xindex && cuddTestInteract(table,yindex,i)) {
01175             if (i < xindex) {
01176                 cuddSetInteract(table,i,xindex);
01177             } else {
01178                 cuddSetInteract(table,xindex,i);
01179             }
01180         }
01181     }
01182 
01183 } /* end of ddUpdateInteractionMatrix */
01184 
01185 
01197 static int
01198 cuddInitLinear(
01199   DdManager * table)
01200 {
01201     int words;
01202     int wordsPerRow;
01203     int nvars;
01204     int word;
01205     int bit;
01206     int i;
01207     long *linear;
01208 
01209     nvars = table->size;
01210     wordsPerRow = ((nvars - 1) >> LOGBPL) + 1;
01211     words = wordsPerRow * nvars;
01212     table->linear = linear = ALLOC(long,words);
01213     if (linear == NULL) {
01214         table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
01215         return(0);
01216     }
01217     table->memused += words * sizeof(long);
01218     table->linearSize = nvars;
01219     for (i = 0; i < words; i++) linear[i] = 0;
01220     for (i = 0; i < nvars; i++) {
01221         word = wordsPerRow * i + (i >> LOGBPL);
01222         bit  = i & (BPL-1);
01223         linear[word] = 1 << bit;
01224     }
01225     return(1);
01226 
01227 } /* end of cuddInitLinear */
01228 
01229 
01241 static int
01242 cuddResizeLinear(
01243   DdManager * table)
01244 {
01245     int words,oldWords;
01246     int wordsPerRow,oldWordsPerRow;
01247     int nvars,oldNvars;
01248     int word,oldWord;
01249     int bit;
01250     int i,j;
01251     long *linear,*oldLinear;
01252 
01253     oldNvars = table->linearSize;
01254     oldWordsPerRow = ((oldNvars - 1) >> LOGBPL) + 1;
01255     oldWords = oldWordsPerRow * oldNvars;
01256     oldLinear = table->linear;
01257 
01258     nvars = table->size;
01259     wordsPerRow = ((nvars - 1) >> LOGBPL) + 1;
01260     words = wordsPerRow * nvars;
01261     table->linear = linear = ALLOC(long,words);
01262     if (linear == NULL) {
01263         table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
01264         return(0);
01265     }
01266     table->memused += (words - oldWords) * sizeof(long);
01267     for (i = 0; i < words; i++) linear[i] = 0;
01268 
01269     /* Copy old matrix. */
01270     for (i = 0; i < oldNvars; i++) {
01271         for (j = 0; j < oldWordsPerRow; j++) {
01272             oldWord = oldWordsPerRow * i + j;
01273             word = wordsPerRow * i + j;
01274             linear[word] = oldLinear[oldWord];
01275         }
01276     }
01277     FREE(oldLinear);
01278 
01279     /* Add elements to the diagonal. */
01280     for (i = oldNvars; i < nvars; i++) {
01281         word = wordsPerRow * i + (i >> LOGBPL);
01282         bit  = i & (BPL-1);
01283         linear[word] = 1 << bit;
01284     }
01285     table->linearSize = nvars;
01286 
01287     return(1);
01288 
01289 } /* end of cuddResizeLinear */
01290 
01291 
01304 static void
01305 cuddXorLinear(
01306   DdManager * table,
01307   int  x,
01308   int  y)
01309 {
01310     int i;
01311     int nvars = table->size;
01312     int wordsPerRow = ((nvars - 1) >> LOGBPL) + 1;
01313     int xstart = wordsPerRow * x;
01314     int ystart = wordsPerRow * y;
01315     long *linear = table->linear;
01316 
01317     for (i = 0; i < wordsPerRow; i++) {
01318         linear[xstart+i] ^= linear[ystart+i];
01319     }
01320 
01321 } /* end of cuddXorLinear */
